not-supported.title: Web browser not supported
not-supported.body: This browser cannot use the File System Access API. Try a different browser or give your browser permission to save files to your device.

startPage.intro: Get responses in fewer steps with a form API key.

beforeStart.heading: Before you start
beforeStart.generateKey: Generate an API key for your form in Settings.
beforeStart.generateKeyDetail: This is how you’ll be able to access new responses.
beforeStart.browserSupport: Ensure you’re using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
beforeStart.browserSupportDetail: Your browser will ask for permission to save files to your device.
beforeStart.attachSafety: Take caution when opening files attachments.
beforeStart.attachSafetyDetail: Check files before opening, verify malicious file attributes, follow warning prompts.

uploadKey.title: Upload your API key file.
uploadKey.detail: This is how you will securely authenticate.

chooseLocation.title: Choose a download location for responses.
chooseLocation.detail: This is where new responses can be appended to files already found in the same folder.

selectFormat.title: Select the format of response files.
selectFormat.detail: This is where you can pick whether you get individual copies in HTML or a CSV spreadsheet.

loadKeyPage.title: Upload your API key file
loadKeyPage.detail: Upload the API key you generated in Settings to get access to your form's responses.
loadKeyPage.noNewResponsesDetail: There are currently no new responses for this form.
loadKeyPage.uploadSuccessMessage: You can now retrieve all new responses for this form.
loadKeyPage.uploadFailedMessage: Make sure you selected the correct file. If it's not working, try regenerating a new API key and uploading it again.

lostKeyTip.title: Don't have your API key?
lostKeyTip.text1: Only one API key file can be associated to a form at a time.
lostKeyTip.text2: Generate a new API key by going to Settings > API integration while signed in to

locationPage.title: Select a save location
locationPage.subheading: Decide where new responses will be downloaded.
locationPage.detail: To add response data to an existing CSV, select the folder where it is currently saved. Make sure the CSV file name still includes the form ID, as it did when originally downloaded.

csvDetected.title: CSV response file detected in folder
csvDetected.message: New response data will be appended to the existing CSV file.

getTemplateFailed.title: Failed to fetch form template
getTemplateFailed.message: There was an error retrieving the form template. Please try again later.

formatPage.title: Choose a response file format
formatPage.subheading: Select the format of new responses.
formatPage.detail: All downloads also include the raw data in JSON format. This allows for an automatic confirmation step without having to copy-paste receipt codes manually.

csv.label: Combined in a spreadsheet (Aggregated CSV file)
csv.hint: Data will be appended to any existing CSV in the folder seleted.

confirmationPage.savedTo: All form submission data can be found in:

processingPage.note: For large downloads, this can take some time.

rateLimitExceeded.title: Rate limit exceeded
rateLimitExceeded.message: You have exceeded the number of allowed requests. Please wait before trying again.

unknownError.title: An unknown error occurred
unknownError.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

errorRetreivingSubmissions.title: Error retrieving submissions
errorRetreivingSubmissions.message: There was an error retrieving form submissions. Please try again later.
